snippet: The Yankess dumped Ivan Nova from his scheduled start Tuesday against the Boston Red Sox and the rookie David Phelps will take his place for the second-to-last regularly scheduled game of the season.
abstract: The Yankess dumped Ivan Nova from his scheduled start Tuesday against the Boston Red Sox and the rookie David Phelps will take his place for the second-to-last regularly scheduled game of the season.

headline.main: Phelps Replaces Nova in Starting Role
